name: LockManager
javadoc: This interface provides a global lock manager

requests.name: AskForLock
requests.javadoc: Request a lock, waiting till it comes available

requests.name: HaveLock
requests.javadoc: Test if we are currently holding the lock
requests.returnsJavadoc: true it we are currently holding the lock

requests.name: RequestLock

parameters.name: waitForLock
parameters.javadoc: If true, wait for the lock, otherwise return immediatly

requests.returnsJavadoc: true it the lock was granted

requests.name: IsLocked
requests.javadoc: Test if the lock is locked
requests.returnsJavadoc: true it the lock is currently locked

parameters.name: holder
parameters.javadoc: The user currently holding the lock

notices.name: WaitingForLock
notices.javadoc: We are waiting for a holder to grant us the lock

parameters.name: holder
parameters.javadoc: The user currently holding the lock
